title: Right-to-Try Act
description: Allowed terminally ill patients access to experimental treatments not yet fully approved by the FDA.
positiveImpact: Expanded patient options in rare cases
fullDetails: Despite skepticism from many medical experts, this legislation successfully provided some patients with access to experimental treatments.

title: First Step Act
description: Bipartisan criminal justice reform that reduced some mandatory minimums and expanded rehabilitation programs.
fullDetails: Details about the First Step Act's positive impacts.

title: VA Accountability Act
description: Made it easier to fire underperforming VA employees, aiming to improve care for veterans.
fullDetails: Details about the VA Accountability Act.

title: USMCA Trade Deal
description: Replaced NAFTA with a new trade agreement, updating labor and environmental standards.
fullDetails: Details about the USMCA trade deal.

title: Right-to-Work Nominations
description: Some judicial and agency appointments have advanced bipartisan causes (e.g., criminal justice reform, antitrust).
